attributes.additional_details: Because our streets are becoming on safe they're costing so much money it's unbelievable we didn't choose for them to be here because the prime minister decided he wanted this to happen that's not a democracy we don't live in a dictatorship this should be put to vote as it's the people that should choose we want our country back to the way it was British people feel so we are being pushed out and we know you can fix it so do that get them gone
attributes.background: Send illegal immigrants home and remove their human right to be here it's not their country and we don't get to choose being is this is a democracy we should be able to choose we should be able to vote and if it's voted that they should be removed then that's what should happen

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703195
